ThingDef.label: Persona Tardus
ThingDef.description:
An ancient vessel, of unknown origin.

Report from the Tuurngait tomb excavation:
(Site of first discovery)

Interviews with subjects indicate contact with the vessel provides a sense of relief, reportedly lasting for a few hours afterwards.

Psychological examination shows slight deviance in the behaviour of subjects, notably a minor increase in agression, and in some cases claims of auditory hallucinations.

Several subjects have developed rashes, and have subsequently been quarantined. Likely unrelated.

Further study advised.
